original_text: So they have known me for a long time. They could tell you that I always obeyed our Jewish laws. They know that I was a Pharisee. I carefully obeyed God's Law, as a Pharisee does. But maybe they do not want to tell you all that.
korean_text: 일찍부터 나를 알았으니 그들이 증언하려 하면 내가 우리 종교의 가장 엄한 파를 따라 바리새인의 생활을 하였다고 할 것이라

sentences.original_text: So they have known me for a long time.
that I always obeyed our Jewish laws.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 항상 유대인 법을 지켰다는 것을.

sentences.original_text: They know that I was a Pharisee.
But maybe they do not want
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 어쩌면 그들은 원하지 않을지도 모릅니다
